overview: Mr. John Yeaman has served as Tylerâ€™s Chairman of the Board since July 2004. From April 2002 until July 2004, he held the office of President and Chief Executive Officer â€” a role he also occupied between December 1998 and March 2000. Mr. Yeaman served as President and Co-Chief Executive Officer from March 2000 until April 2002. In February 1999, he was elected to the board of directors. He also serves as Chairman of the Executive Committee. Prior to joining Tyler, Mr. Yeaman was affiliated with Electronic Data Systems Corporation (EDS). He began his career with Eastman Kodak Company. Mr. Yeaman also serves on the board of directors of Park Cities Bank in Dallas, Texas.
